function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High hedonic well-being and low eudaimonic well-being","Impact":"Higher rates of mental illness and worse outcomes","Mitigation":"Promote a balance between hedonic and eudaimonic well-being","Technologies":"Mental health screening tools, therapy, and counseling","People":"Individuals with high hedonic well-being and low eudaimonic well-being","Owner":"Healthcare professionals and mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Non-prospective studies with non-randomized samples","Impact":"Potential for biased or unreliable results","Mitigation":"Conduct prospective studies with randomized samples","Technologies":"Randomization tools, data analysis software","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions and funding organizations"},{"Description":"Inverse prediction of healthcare costs and sickness benefit transfers","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate predictions and misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Validate predictive models with real-world data, consider additional factors influencing healthcare costs","Technologies":"Predictive modeling software, data validation tools","People":"Public health analysts, healthcare administrators","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare organizations"}]}
